entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:43 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
